name: Open Notification Setting, select one branch, all position, one employee name and add

testSteps.description: [1] {notificationMenu=Notification Setting, parentMenuText=Notification, number=13000002, string=triarrow, lang=en, addBtn=Add, successSave=Save successfully, deleteSuccess=Delete successfully, existedEmpMessage=Employee existed, viewNotificationsVisible=Visible, viewNotificationsNotVisible=Not Visible}

children.description: When I open Login page
And I input my credentials username 13000002 and password triarrow
And I change language to en
And I open submenu Notification Setting of parent menu Notification
Then The system should open 'Notification' page

And In Notification Setting screen, i select more dropdown with value below
| valueBranch | valuePosition | valueEmpName |
| 大阪府 | All position | third in list dropdown |
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
Then In Notification Setting screen, Table in the right have Employee Name selected added
And In Notification Setting screen, link View Notifications is Visible
And In Notification Setting screen, System show message Save successfully
And In Notification Setting screen, I delete all in table notification, show message Delete successfully
And In Notification Setting screen, link View Notifications is Not Visible
When In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
Then In Notification Setting screen, Table in the right have Employee Name selected added
And In Notification Setting screen, System show message Save successfully
When In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
Then In Notification Setting screen, System show message Employee existed
And In Notification Setting screen, I delete all in table notification, show message Delete successfully
And In Notification Setting screen, link View Notifications is Not Visible
And I logout from system

userStory.narrative:
As an user
I want to be able use Notification Setting

title: Open Notification Setting, select one branch, all position, one employee name and add
